____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''isDedicated''' </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[isDedicated]]) [[then]] {[[diag_log]] "Dedicated Server on the run !";};</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[isServer]], [[hasInterface]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on December 21, 2014 - 14:54 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Killzone Kid|Killzone Kid]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
<code>[[if]] ([[isDedicated]]) [[then]] {
	//run on dedicated server only
};

[[if]] ([[isServer]]) [[then]] {
	//run on dedicated server or player host
};

[[if]] ([[hasInterface]]) [[then]] {
	//run on all player clients incl. player host
};

[[if]] (![[isDedicated]]) [[then]] {
	//run on all player clients incl. player host and headless clients
};

[[if]] (![[isServer]]) [[then]] {
	//run on all player clients incl. headless clients but not player host
};

[[if]] (![[hasInterface]]) [[then]] {
	//run on headless clients and dedicated server
};

[[if]] (![[hasInterface]] && ![[isDedicated]]) [[then]] {
	//run on headless clients only
};</code>
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
